DefEnergy2.English: Restore energy every turn. The restoration increases at low HP.\n\nRequires Vigor.

DefInfection2.English: Infection duration is reduced by 2 (instead of 1) every turn.\n\nRequires Immunity.

DefHP1.English: Restore 1 HP every turn when your current HP is less than 5.

DefHP2.English: Restore 1 HP when you kill an enemy.\n\nRequires First Aid.

AttEnergy1.English: Your target loses energy, which increases with your damage, when being hit.

AttInfection1.English: Your attack has a greater chance to cause infection.

Title.English: Key Bindings\n\n(Refer to manual.txt for more information.)

Normal.English:
[ hjklyubn | Num pad | Arrow keys ] -- Move in eight directions.
[ . | Num pad 5 ] -- Wait 1 turn.
[ Space ] -- Confirm.
[ Esc ] -- Exit or cancel.

Examine.English: [ x ] -- Enter Examine mode.\n[ o | d | PgDn] -- Lock next NPC in view.\n[ i | s | PgUp] -- Lock previous NPC in view.

Menu.English:
[ c ] -- Open menu to buy powers.
[ v | m ] -- Open menu to view log.
[ / | ? ] -- Open menu to view help.
[ Tab | Shift + Tab ] -- Switch between menus.
